* [Mayor and Council](https://www.shavanoparktx.gov/government/mayor_and_council.php)

This section contains information on the City Government, from City Council to the various Boards and Commissions appointed by Council. This section also includes the Agendas and Minutes archives, a link to the City's Ordinances hosted by Municode, and document center for all the City's policies.
